sentences.english: However, he could not agree with those cities, he went back to Nanjing at last.
sentences.chinese: 這些城市都與他性格不合，他最後又回到南京。

sentences.english: It was working against the collar for the boy to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 要那男孩彈鋼琴，這與他的性格不合。
